job.job_title: LLM Research Intern: Physics-AI-Powered Analysis of Atomistic Systems
job.job_description: onsemi (Nasdaq: ON) is driving disruptive innovations to help build a better future. With a focus on automotive and industrial end-markets, the company is accelerating change in megatrends such as vehicle electrification and safety, sustainable energy grids, industrial automation, and 5G and cloud infrastructure. With a highly differentiated and innovative product portfolio, onsemi creates intelligent power and sensing technologies that solve the world’s most complex challenges and leads the way in creating a safer, cleaner, and smarter world. Here at onsemi we take great pride in our internship program and the efforts we take to provide students with hands-on industry experience. We provide competitive pay, medical benefits, various networking event opportunities, and flexible hours based on school schedule.

job.job_title: LSE Technical Undergraduate Nuclear Dose Modeling Intern - Nuclear Materials
job.job_description: Nuclear Dose Modeling Intern The Global Security Directorate is seeking a talented and enthusiastic intern to contribute towards key projects supporting the Department of Energy’s national security mission. Experience a work environment that thrives on innovation, collaboration, and partnership. The ideal candidate will be working toward a bachelor’s degree with a focus in nuclear engineering, nuclear engineering technology, or a closely related field.
